original: Adlercreutz, Hedvig Ulrika Charlotta, praktiserande läkare, Karlshamn, f. 24/3/07 i Ängelholm av las :läk. Carl A. o. grev:an Eva Hamilton. G. 44 m. Dr phil. Ebbe (Christian) Latorn, chef f. tjeckoslov. turistbyrån i Sthlm. Barn: Charlotte f. 45, Merit 47. — Stud :ex. i Hälsingborg 25, med. kand. i Lund 30, med. lic. där 37. As’sàs’t :läk. v. Lundis kir. klinik 36, v. Hälsingb. las. med. avd. 37, div. förordn. ’S. und:-läk. v. Kristianstads las. med. avd. 37 -38 samt is. e. läk. v. S:ta Maria isjukh. 37-38, und:iäk. v. Fagereds s-anat. 39-41, v. Karlshamns las. med. avd, 41-43, prakt. läk. i Karlishamn ised. 43.
translated: Adlercreutz, Hedvig Ulrika Charlotta, practicing physician, Karlshamn, born March 24th, 1907 in Ängelholm to physician Carl A. and Countess Eva Hamilton. Married at 44 to Dr. Phil. Ebbe (Christian) Latorn, head of the Czechoslovak tourist bureau in Stockholm. Children: Charlotte born in 1945, and Merit born in 1947. Studied in Hälsingborg, passed the medical exam in Lund in 1930, and became a licensed physician there in 1937. Worked as an assistant physician at Lund's surgical clinic in 1936, at Hälsingborg hospital's medical department in 1937, as well as with various appointments as an Under-Lieutenant Medical Officer (S. und) at Kristianstad Hospital's medical department in 1937-38 and as a ward physician at S:ta Maria Hospital in 1937-38. Worked as an Under-Lieutenant Medical Officer at Fagereds sanatorium in 1939-41, at Karlshamn Hospital's medical department in 1941-43, and as a practicing physician in Karlshamn since 1943.
